content: {A歪头}What's that sound...? <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>! Did you hear that? It was like a "thump-thump" noise...

content: Wait, I think it's gone again... Let me listen more carefully. Maybe{短暂停} we're on the verge of a big discovery!
